messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

another oracle issue sent july another issue hi queried with report normally run shows put days public holiday for but there were public holidays for queried if you below says was for weird thing if was problem should be showing for everyone one person reduced his where should have gone billable can you assist please planning officer infrastructure upcoming holiday wednesday th july friday th july inclusive please consider environment you really need print sent july re hi public holiday was booked for th kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent july hi looks like you booked public holiday for can you check back your why you would have done means less billable thanks planning officer infrastructure upcoming holiday wednesday th july friday th july inclusive please consider environment you really need print

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing inquiries**

It seems like there's no specific IT service request here, more of an inquiry regarding public holidays in the Oracle report and its effect on billable hours. I think using "Miscellaneous" might be best since it doesn't really fit into other categories. Alternatively, "Access" could work if it relates to booking holidays, but administrative rights don't seem to apply. "HR Support" and "Internal Project" don't quite fit either, so "Miscellaneous" feels appropriate or possibly "Internal Project."{"category":"Miscellaneous"}
